The course uses an older version of WordPress so somethings are different and need a little time to adjust.

results.content:
Was hoping for a bit more understanding of WPBakery, however, overall it was a good course.

What I particularly likes was the concise delivery of well-thought-out information, in a slow, digestible manner. Good overview for people brand new to websites; but a bit rudimentary for me.

results.content:
I think this is just about the worst course that I have purchase on Udemy. The instructor speaks in a very flat monotone voice with no enthusiasm or energy. The way that each video is setup has you basically just following along with the instructor with little explanation on what you are doing and why. The flow of the course goes  "first do this, then do this, next you will see this". I don't think I can finish this one...

Edit: I don't mind the step-by-step flow of this course, it is the delivery that is the problem for me. Next time you should try to imagine that you are talking with students in a classroom setting. Have some energy and make it fun. This will help students get through the course without falling a sleep.

response.content: Myisha -  Thanks for updating your review! I agree with you 100%! I will be spending some time analyzing the course to see how I can update it as well as be more energetic in my future courses. Cheers!
response.content_html: Myisha - Thanks for updating your review! I agree with you 100%! I will be spending some time analyzing the course to see how I can update it as well as be more energetic in my future courses. Cheers!

results.content: This course does an excellent job at describing everything you need to know to go from nothing all the way to having really impressive working Wordpress websites. The instructor explains everything in superb detail, even showing you the common errors that you might encounter along the way. In a very short space of time these lectures have allowed me to go from not knowing almost anything about Wordpress to having an excellent understanding of its core features as well as much more. If you are interested in learning about the essentials of Wordpress as well as finding out about how to launch your own Wordpress website then you really need look no further this course covers it all.
